excerpt: Museum displaying exhibits on American crimes, from the Old West to modern serial killers.
detail_description: Alcatraz East Crime Museum is a 25,000-square-foot museum located in The Island in Pigeon Forge. It features five galleries that cover the history of American crime, crime scene investigation, the consequences of crime, crime fighting, and pop culture. The museum showcases over 100 interactive exhibits and artifacts related to notorious criminals such as Al Capone and John Dillinger.
name: Alcatraz East Crime Museum

excerpt: This popular road in the city center is filled with restaurants, stores, hotels & amusement centers.
detail_description: The Island Dr is a bustling hub in the heart of the city, offering an array of dining options, retail stores, accommodations, and entertainment venues. One of its main attractions is Margaritaville's St. Somewhere Spa, where visitors can indulge in custom treatments such as Volcano Hot Stone Massage and Signature Key Lime Margarita Spa Manicure. Additionally, The Island features the Great Smoky Mountain Wheel, providing breathtaking views from its 200-foot-tall structure.
name: The Island Dr

excerpt: This museum dedicated to the famed Titanic is shaped like the ship & features recovered artifacts.
detail_description: The TITANIC Museum Attraction in Pigeon Forge offers an immersive experience dedicated to the famous ship. Shaped like the Titanic itself, the museum features recovered artifacts and interactive exhibits that change annually, focusing on different aspects of the passengers and the ship. Visitors receive a ticket representing a real-life passenger at the start of their journey. Inside, there are replicas of staterooms and dining halls with stunning architectural details matching those of the original Titanic.
name: Titanic Museum Attraction

excerpt: Homestyle dinner feast followed by a farcical musical revue with dancing & comedy.
detail_description: The Hatfield & McCoy Dinner Feud is a unique dinner show that features a comedic musical revue alongside a delicious homestyle feast. The production, created by the same company behind the Comedy Barn, brings to life the legendary feud between the Hatfield and McCoy families through mountain-style competitions, song and dance numbers, feats of strength, stunts, comedy routines, and even platform diving.
name: Hatfield & McCoy Dinner Feud
address: 119 Music Rd, Pigeon Forge, TN 37863, USA

excerpt: Amusement park offering zorbing on 4 different tracks, including zig-zag & downhill courses.
detail_description: Outdoor Gravity Park in Pigeon Forge is an amusement park that offers a unique adventure known as zorbing. This one-of-a-kind attraction allows visitors to climb into a giant, transparent ball and roll down different hillside tracks, experiencing the exhilaration of zorbing. With various tracks to choose from, including zig-zag and downhill courses, Outdoor Gravity Park provides plenty of laughs and excitement for families.
name: Outdoor Gravity Park
address: 203 Sugar Hollow Rd, Pigeon Forge, TN 37863, USA

excerpt: Visitors can view & pose for photos with sculpted replicas of film stars at this attraction.
detail_description: Located in Pigeon Forge, the Hollywood Wax Museum is a must-visit attraction for movie enthusiasts. The museum showcases incredibly lifelike wax figures of iconic celebrities from classic film stars to today's A-listers. Visitors can walk the red carpet and pose with their favorite stars, creating memorable photo opportunities. The museum also features cool props to enhance the experience.
name: Hollywood Wax Museum
address: 106 Showplace Blvd A, Pigeon Forge, TN 37863, USA

excerpt: Family-friendly comedic show features performing animals, magicians, jugglers, music & more.
detail_description: Situated on the Parkway in Pigeon Forge, the Comedy Barn Theater has been entertaining families for over 25 years with its clean and family-friendly comedy. This renowned theater boasts a diverse lineup of entertainment, featuring ventriloquists, jugglers, magicians, singers, trained animals, and top comedians from around the country. With over seven million visitors and nightly standing ovations, this show promises large doses of humor and non-stop laughter.
name: Comedy Barn Theater

excerpt: Large venue for family-friendly variety shows featuring live music, comedy & dancing.
detail_description: Country Tonite is a popular theater in Pigeon Forge known for its family-friendly variety shows. The high-energy revue features the greatest hits of country music, along with comedy, gospel music, and patriotic tunes. The talented cast of singers and dancers delivers toe-tapping renditions of classic country hits and today's chart-toppers. Hosted by Kevin Wilson and featuring comic relief from Bubba The Redneck Ranger, the show offers non-stop entertainment for all ages.
name: Country Tonite
address: 129 Showplace Blvd, Pigeon Forge, TN 37863, USA

excerpt: Unique, mile-long downhill roller coaster where riders control velocity & braking.
detail_description: Nestled in the Great Smoky Mountain National Park area, the Smoky Mountain Alpine Coaster is a must-visit attraction. This unique mile-long roller coaster offers an exhilarating experience as riders have control over their speed and braking. The coaster descends 363 feet over a mile, reaching speeds of up to 27 miles per hour. What sets it apart is that each car has its own brakes, allowing riders to customize their ride experience.
name: Smoky Mountain Alpine Coaster
address: 867 Wears Valley Rd, Pigeon Forge, TN 37863, USA

detail_description: The Old Mill Square in Gatlinburg, Tennessee is a charming and picturesque shopping district that offers visitors a unique and memorable experience. Nestled just past traffic light #6, The Village Shops feature 27 distinct shops and eateries set in a quaint European village-themed atmosphere. Visitors can immerse themselves in the ambiance of a bygone era while perusing an array of items and clothing, creating an enjoyable shopping experience.
name: The Old Mill Square
address: Old Mill St, Pigeon Forge, TN 37863, USA

excerpt: Year-round indoor snow park with tubing slides & an open play area, plus a snack bar.
detail_description: Pigeon Forge Snow is a year-round indoor snow park offering an exciting snow tubing experience for the whole family. With fresh snow made daily, visitors can enjoy tubing down multiple slopes as many times as they want with hourly passes. The climate-controlled environment ensures a comfortable temperature of 60-70 degrees Fahrenheit, allowing for endless fun in the snow play area where one can build snowmen and forts.
name: Pigeon Forge Snow
address: 2533 Teaster Ln, Pigeon Forge, TN 37863, USA

detail_description: WonderWorks is a popular attraction that offers an array of interactive exhibits and experiences for visitors. Situated within a short driving distance from other top attractions, this unique destination provides entertainment and educational opportunities for all ages. With its engaging displays and hands-on activities, WonderWorks promises an enjoyable experience for families and individuals alike.
name: Wonderworks

excerpt: Family amusement park with log-rolling, sawing & chopping contests, zip lines & a high ropes course.
detail_description: Paula Deen's Lumberjack Feud Supper Show is a family-friendly amusement park featuring thrilling lumberjack competitions and interactive experiences. The show showcases real-life lumberjack athletes competing in classic events such as log rolling, speed climbing, axe throwing, and more. The outdoor venue includes water features and climbing poles while providing covered seating for the audience. In addition to the main show, guests can participate in an interactive lumberjack experience to try their hand at various lumberjack skills.
name: Paula Deen's Lumberjack Feud Supper Show

excerpt: Attraction with 100+ hands-on science exhibits, plus laser tag, a ropes course & a 4D motion ride.
detail_description: WonderWorks Pigeon Forge is an attraction featuring over 100 hands-on science exhibits, as well as activities like laser tag, a ropes course, and a 4D motion ride. Located in close proximity to various popular attractions such as the Great Smoky Mountains, Dollywood/Splash Country, and Titanic Museum, it offers convenient access to the region's main highlights.
name: WonderWorks Pigeon Forge
address: 100 Music Rd, Pigeon Forge, TN 37863, USA

excerpt: Themed Christmas decorations & gifts, plus photos with Santa, seasonal candy & festive outfits.
detail_description: Nestled near the West Prong Little Pigeon River, The Christmas Place is a festive wonderland that celebrates the holiday spirit all year round. The Inn at Christmas Place, an enchanting hotel with Bavarian architecture, offers a magical experience with its vibrant decorations and regular themed events. Guests can enjoy Singing Santa performances and a musical glockenspiel playing Christmas carols. The hotel also features 24-hour indoor pool access and a hot tub.
name: The Christmas Place

detail_description: Flyaway Indoor Skydiving in Pigeon Forge offers a unique experience with its vertical wind tunnel that simulates the feeling of free falling without having to jump out of an airplane. Visitors can enjoy indoor skydiving lessons and observe the thrilling activity from an observation deck. The attraction's friendly staff provides all the necessary instructions, making it suitable for beginners.
name: Flyaway Indoor Skydiving

detail_description: If you're seeking an exhilarating way to explore the outdoors, consider visiting Scenic Helicopter Tours Ticket & Information Center. They have been providing scenic helicopter tours of the Great Smoky Mountains National Park and surrounding areas for over 50 years. Whether it's your first time in a helicopter or you want to admire the Smokies from above, their comfortable aircraft can accommodate you and your group. From Mount Le Conte to Douglas Lake, their tours offer a unique perspective of the Smoky Mountains.
name: Scenic Helicopter Tours Ticket & Information Center

excerpt: Family-friendly attraction with candy-themed indoor & outdoor mini-golf, plus escape rooms & snacks.
detail_description: Crave Golf Club in Pigeon Forge is a family-friendly destination offering candy-themed indoor and outdoor mini-golf, along with escape rooms and snacks. The indoor course takes players through a dreamland of cocoa cliffs, ice cream canyons, and a sugar safari, complete with delectable obstacles. Meanwhile, the rooftop mini golf course features 19 holes winding through environments like Rock Candy Mountain and Jellybean Jungle.
name: Crave Golf Club

excerpt: Seasonal 35-acre water park owned & inspired by singer Dolly Parton, featuring many water slides.
detail_description: Dollywood's Splash Country is a 35-acre water park inspired by Dolly Parton, offering a variety of water slides. Located near the Great Smoky Mountains, it's conveniently close to several attractions and annual events. The park provides free admission for kids under 3 and features kid-friendly areas like Little Creek Falls with shallow pools and fun slides, as well as The Cascades where children can explore hidden misters, bubblers, and slides in secret coves around the pool perimeter.
name: Dollywood's Splash Country
address: 2700 Dollywood Parks Blvd, Pigeon Forge, TN 37863, USA

excerpt: Pigeon Forge, a mountain town and vacation area in eastern Tennessee, is the home of Dollywood, country singer Dolly Partons Appalachian-themed park consisting of rides, an adjoining water park and a museum of her costumes and memorabilia. The citys other attractions include country music revues like the Smoky Mountain Opry, dinner theaters such as Dolly Parton's Dixie Stampede and outlet malls.
detail_description: Pigeon Forge, located in eastern Tennessee, is a charming mountain town known for its array of attractions. One of the highlights is Dollywood, an Appalachian-themed amusement park founded by country singer Dolly Parton. Visitors can enjoy rides, a water park, and a museum showcasing Parton's costumes and memorabilia. The city also offers entertainment options such as country music revues at venues like the Smoky Mountain Opry and dinner theaters including Dolly Parton's Dixie Stampede.
name: Pigeon Forge
